actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to assist the construction and operation of burn facilities.

summary.text: Burn Facilities Act- Directs the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to expand the programs on the treatment of burn injuries, research on burns, and the rehabilitation of burn victims by establishing additional burn centers, upgrading hospital burn units, and supporting research and training programs in the treatment and rehabilitation of burn victims. Directs the Secretary of Commerce to assist the Secretary by providing information on existing burn treatment programs and specified other information. Authorizes the appropriation of specified sums in fiscal years 1976 through 1978, and the appropriation of such sums as may thereafter be necessary, to carry out the purposes of this Act. u41

titles.title: A bill to assist the construction and operation of burn facilities.
